name: cnyks
description: Command line introspection tool for nodejs (interactive runner)

scripts.test: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --dir coverage/master --print none --report none node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/ && node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js  report --include coverage/master/coverage.json --include coverage/child/coverage.json --dir coverage/html/ text-summary html lcov

author: Francois Leurent <131.js@cloudyks.org>
